messages.content: U: Create a brief titled 'Nimbus brief for a demo feature set' about a demo feature set for a trial cohort. Export as txt. A: Thanks. Keep it minimal or add more detail? U: Short spec with three sections, please.

Title: Nimbus brief for a demo feature set Sections: - Summary: Purpose: set expectations for a trial cohort. Use case: internal alignment. - Assumptions: Assumptions are placeholders for now. Out of scope: real-world specifics. - Plan: Risk: scope drift. Follow-up: refine after review.
